title: THE MANDALORIAN Episode 6 Breakdown! New Theories and Details You Missed! "The Prisoner"
author: Think Story
comment: Baby Yoda was cute as usual and that Twi'lek was kinda hot... dont @ me.
Hahah the “gawd damn” when baby yoda thought he killed zero

It seemed to me less like Mando and Xi'an actually had a romantic relationship and more like her banter was just a part of her personality. He seemed fed up with her antics. We have also seen how he acts around those who he may have a genuine connection with in episode 4 with Omera. It seems more like Xi'an has always been flirtatiously teasing, and Mando was just used to that being a facet of her personality. She also doesn’t seem the type to be modest. If she actually had a thing with Mando, she probably wouldn’t have been so vague about it like with the, “A lady never tells.” She would definitely use a past romantic history against him to bully him, as we see her do when she spoke about Alzoc III. She doesn’t have anything on him, but she pretends like she does.
I felt so bad when the baby fell on the floor😥
I had a mini heart attack when baby Yoda fell
description:
Episode 6 of "The Mandalorian" is finally here! I breakdown, review, recap, and go over theories, details, and easter eggs for season one chapter 6 "The Prisoner".
